name: Robo Replay
description:
Play as a robot with a special ability: whenever it dies, it leaves behind a copy of itself. Using deadly spikes and lasers to your advantage, make your way through several puzzles.

Controls

  • WASD: walk
  • Space: jump
  • Escape: pause
  • F11: toggle fullscreen

Assets
I used "Beauty Flow" by Kevin MacLeod as background music.
